before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"3eh5t","text":"Wear PPEs before entering perfusion room, i.e. gloves, coat, hair net, safety glasses and face mask. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85ot1","text":"Make sure the Hazardous Waste container is not full. Replace if full. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34hta","text":"Turn lever ON before using down draft necropsy table.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2t51","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55jsk","text":"Preparing Apparatus and Anesthesia:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ptei","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79m08","text":"Install the tubes into peristaltic pump. Place one end of the tubing into containers of ice-cold PBS (1x) and 4% PFA.  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ev5rn","text":"Use parafilm to cover PFA bottle to reduce evaporation.  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61gru","text":"Prime the pump by first allowing the fixative to pass the t-stop and follow with PBS (PBS enters the circulation system first). Make sure no air bubble in lines. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pqiu","text":"Weight the mouse to the nearest 0.1 gram. Anesthetize with Avertin (dosage: 0.3ml/10g body weight, i.p.). Place the mouse back to the home cage. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9aque","text":"Use toe pinch-response method to determine depth of anesthesia.  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pt0o","text":"Place the animals on a polystyrene foam lying on the back with face upward, and gently pin the forepaws and hindpaws using 22G needles.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8mrn6","text":"This protocol details the procedure of the mouse transcardiac perfusion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frnao","text":"Avertin (1x)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd31t","text":"Ice cold PBS (1x)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsq6t","text":"Ice cold 4% paraformaldehyde","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95pev","text":"Ice bucket with ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fio1f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2p2g4","text":"Dissection and perfusion tools:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hb3g","text":"Peristaltic pump","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24kdu","text":"Tubing ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1notm","text":"Barbed forceps ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gbm0","text":"Large scissors ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74af2","text":"Small scissors ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg505","text":"1 curved clamp for descending aorta ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2m6u","text":"Small bone cutter ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqv5r","text":"Curved fine forceps ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bgtd5","text":"Glass vials  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43gr0","text":"Tape for labeling ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"266l5","text":"22G needles for pinning down paws ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bf8m","text":"27G needles for IP injection ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rddi","text":"1ml syringe","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a1pj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"daat9","text":"Make an incision through the abdominal skin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1jrvc","text":"Make two additional skin incisions from the xiphoid process along the base of the ventral ribcage laterally.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"o7k4","text":"Gently reflect the two flaps of skin to expose thoracic field completely.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3cm1q","text":"Grasp the cartilage of the xiphoid process with blunt forceps and raise it slightly to insert pointed scissors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ffi61","text":"Separate the diaphragm from the chest wall on both sides with scissor cuts.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f29fu","text":"Clamp or pin the reflected ribcage laterally to expose the heart.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aioe5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"53s87","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":9,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bqfo8","text":"Optional: Clamp the descending aorta, just below the liver, using the hemostat clamp.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1e27t","text":"Gently grasp the pericardial sac with fingers or blunt forceps, and tear it fully.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"frm0o","text":"Secure the beating heart with fingers or blunt forceps, and immediately insert a blunt 25G syringe needle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"n13e","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3qiej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":10,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"fcmbh","text":"Optional: Clamp the needle to the left ventricle using a hemostat.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eg1qt","text":"Cut the right atrium with scissors, and at the first sign of blood flow, begin the infusion of 1x PBS at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":105,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"7.5","error":false,"guid":"94678C20F5E611EC822069AB117EDD0F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1630}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ft2dj","text":"Continue perfusion with PBS until the fluid exiting the right atrium is entirely clear, approximately  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"29E41EC0F5E311EC822069AB117EDD0F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"caj7e","text":"Switch perfusate to fixative (4% PFA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3m96","text":"Continue PFA perfusion at   for additional  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8foj3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"7.5","error":false,"guid":"A11FECF0F5E611EC822069AB117EDD0F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1630}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"4FDB34B0F5E311EC822069AB117EDD0F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pe09","text":"Cut the thoracic musculature and ribcage between the breastbone and medial rib insertion points and extend the incision rostrally to the level of the clavicles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4q58t","text":"Decapitate the mouse with large surgical scissors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eahrb","text":"Make a midline incision to expose the skull.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmqui","text":"Trim off the remaining neck muscle so that the base of the skull is exposed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4j656","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2accm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"22jlu","text":"Note: Remove any residual muscle using scissors or rongeurs.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23h8o","text":"Use the sharp surgical scissors to cut through the midline of skull.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7l89j","text":"Gently peel off the skull using blunt forceps and remove the brain out of skull, cut optic nerves if necessary.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b4qkg","text":"Place the brain into a glass vial filled with  -  4% PFA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"DBAED720F5E411EC822069AB117EDD0F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"E4C16170F5E411EC822069AB117EDD0F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"acrmb","text":"Keep the brain in fixative for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"FF0A3E20F5E511EC822069AB117EDD0F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0676E0A0F5E611EC822069AB117EDD0F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f5lip","text":"After 24 hours, rinse the brain with 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"canek","text":"Store the brains in PBS and keep at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2D164480F5E611EC822069AB117EDD0F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8c88j","text":"Rinse the brain with 1x PBS 3 times at   intervals, and swirl occasionally (1/3).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"5A1C58BEF6A911ECB1830A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cme81","text":"Rinse the brain with 1x PBS 3 times at   intervals, and swirl occasionally (3/3).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"6DE141E0F6A911ECB1830A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2e6eo","text":"Rinse the brain with 1x PBS 3 times at   intervals, and swirl occasionally (2/3).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"6D51EB95F6A911ECB1830A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

title: Standard Operating Procedure: Mouse transcardiac perfusion protocol
